response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item holds significant value and potential for growth, which we believe aligns perfectly with your needs and aspirations. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $14,500. This is a unique opportunity to secure an asset that could be worth even more in the future. We understand that this might be a substantial investment, but we're confident it will pay off in terms of both utility and financial return. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 14500}
